column6: Apocalypse has been destroyed; the end of the world has been averted.  Or has it?  Sinister has just unleashed a massive force unseen, unrivaled, and unbeatable.
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | colorist:Edgar Delgado | letterer:Dave Sharpe | inker:Tim Townsend | writer:Akira Yoshida
